dutiesAndRoles: Develop and maintain the frontend of web applications using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Collaborate with designers and backend developers to implement user-friendly interfaces.
Optimize web applications for maximum speed and scalability.
Debug and fix frontend issues and bugs.
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field (or equivalent work experience).
skillsRequired: Proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Strong understanding of frontend frameworks and libraries.
Experience with responsive design and cross-browser compatibility.
Familiarity with version control systems.
requiredExperienceAndKnowledge: Minimum X years of experience as a frontend developer.
Proven track record of delivering high-quality frontend solutions.

dutiesAndRoles: Develop and maintain both frontend and backend components of web applications.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and implement scalable solutions.
Write efficient and clean code using Python and React.
Implement and integrate APIs and third-party services.
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field (or equivalent work experience).
skillsRequired: Proficient in Python for backend development.
Experience with frontend development using React.
Familiarity with databases and SQL.
Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
requiredExperienceAndKnowledge: Minimum X years of experience as a fullstack developer.
Demonstrated ability to work on complex web applications.

dutiesAndRoles: Assist in developing and maintaining frontend components of web applications.
Collaborate with senior developers to implement user interfaces.
Write clean and efficient code using JavaScript, React, and Sass.
Participate in code reviews and debugging activities.
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field (or equivalent work experience).
skillsRequired: Proficient in JavaScript for frontend development.
Knowledge of frontend frameworks, particularly React.
Experience with CSS preprocessors like Sass.
Strong attention to detail and ability to work in a team.
requiredExperienceAndKnowledge: Some experience or internships in frontend development.
Familiarity with version control systems like Git.
